Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Evenborough Way, north of the Delgado Family Winery.
Room.LongDescription: Althoguh Chateau Richland owns most of the grape fields in Oceancrest, the Delgado family grows a small orchard of grapes that they use to make their wines. Being in such limited supply makes them very popular and highly demanded. Although the Chateau Richland wines are a bit more popular, the Delgado wines have a small, but powerful following.
